dcterms:creator: M. Bień
M. Gilski
M. Maciejewska
W. Taisner
D. Wisniewski
dcterms:description: The RecipeNLG dataset is the largest accessible dataset in the domain, containing 2,231,142 different culinary recipes. It includes culinary recipes from various sources such as cookbooks, blogs, and recipe websites, and is regarded as the first publicly accessible dataset of culinary recipes.
dcterms:title: RecipeNLG Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Marin
A. Biswas
F. Oflí
N. Hynes
A. Salvador
Y. Aytar
I. Weber
dcterms:description: Recipe1M+ is a large-scale, organized corpus containing over one million culinary recipes and 13 million food photos. It provides the opportunity to train high-capacity models on aligned, multi-modal data.
dcterms:title: Recipe1M+ Dataset

dcterms:description: The 3A2M Cooking Recipes Dataset is an annotated dataset of two million culinary recipes categorized into nine genres, developed through domain experts and an active learning technique.
dcterms:title: 3A2M Cooking Recipes Dataset
